medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient reported multiple prior similar lesions that resolved with antibiotic ointment or self-puncturing. On examination, a 2 centimeter cutaneous abscess with surrounding cellulitis was noted. The current lesion had improved at a 48-hour recheck.
medical_history.past_medical_history: No diabetes, HIV, or other immunocompromising conditions, previously healthy.
medical_history.social_history: The patient is an exotic dancer, and performing lap dances involves repeated skin contact with clients. Other lap dancers at her club reported similar skin problems, which are considered a known occupational hazard.
